class.name: PLATEAUCityModel
class.brief_description: Main class for loading and processing CityGML files.

method.name: load
method.description: Load a CityGML file from the specified path. Returns [code]true[/code] if loading was successful. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS). Use pre-converted assets instead.

method.name: is_loaded
method.description: Returns [code]true[/code] if a CityGML file has been successfully loaded.

method.name: get_gml_path
method.description: Returns the path of the currently loaded GML file.

method.name: extract_meshes
method.description: Extract meshes from the loaded CityGML using the specified options. Returns an array of [PLATEAUMeshData] objects. [b]Note:[/b] This method is not supported on mobile platforms (Android/iOS). Use pre-converted assets instead.

method.name: get_center_point
method.description: Get the center point of the city model in the specified coordinate zone.

method.name: get_city_object_attributes
method.description: Get attributes of a CityObject by its GML ID. Returns an empty Dictionary if not found.

method.name: get_city_object_type
method.description: Get the CityObject type by GML ID. Returns a [enum PLATEAUCityObjectType] value.
